ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.2_0: Now at that time Venerable Nanda was attractive, good-looking, lovely, of surpassing fourfold army.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.3_0: but he wore a robe that was the same size as the Buddha’s.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.4_0: Seeing him coming off in the distance,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.6_0: they thought it was the Buddha and got up from their seats.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.7_0: But when he came close, they realized who it was, and they complained and criticized him,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.8_0: “How can Venerable Nanda wear a robe the same size as the Buddha’s?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.9_0: “Is it true, Nanda, that you do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.12_0: “... Nanda, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.14_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.15.1_0: ‘If a monk has a robe that’s the right size, if he has a robe, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.16_0: This is the right size: one who has participated in the robe-making procedure.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.17_0: This is the right kind of robe-cloth.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.4_0: ...The monk who has been given the full ordination by a unanimous Sangha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.6_0: nine standard handspans long and six wide.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.8_0: if he makes one or has one made, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.9_0: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.10.1_0: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.11_0: If he has others finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.12_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.13_0: If he has others finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.14_0: If he makes one, or has one made, for someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.1.15_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.2_0: if he makes it less than the right size;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.3_0: if he obtains what was made by another and then uses it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.4_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.6_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.7_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on Nanda, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.8_0: The ninth sub-chapter on precious things is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.14_0: “Venerables, the ninety-two rules on confession have been recited.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.15_0: In regard to this I ask you,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.21_0: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.22_0: The section on minor rules has been completed.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:2.2.23_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession is finished.
